titleStmt.title: Mercurius centralis, or, A discourse of subterraneal cockle, muscle and oyster-shels found in the digging of a well at Sir William Doylie's in Norfolk many foot under ground and at considerable distance from the sea / sent in a letter to Thomas Brown by Tho. Lawrence.
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, Thomas, A.M.
Browne, Thomas, Sir, 1605-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for J. Collins ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
